name: Consequence-Final
description:
There was a world which is keeping by anciend souls. But one day souls are corrupted from a bad magic which is came from over the sky. Meanwhile a hero decided to save the world. He found roadmates. They let him use their powers so he became to able swim and fly.

We have three characters

Walking Character 

A - D Movement 

Space Jump

Flying Character

Space Jump

Swimming Character 

A - S - D - W Movement
